channel.title: Scar 2.03
channel.description:
Since I've heard that most of the good SCAR scripts still only remain usable on SCAR 2.03.. I took to downloading it, but every link i've used for SCAR 2.03 has a virus according to AVG (I've even used the one on Freddy1990's website) - I was thinking maybe AVG was being annoying, so I disabled it and tried to run SCAR 2.03 but it gives me this error: ( on every download I've tried )
' Windows cannot access the specified device, path, or file. You may not have the appropriate permissions to access the item '
I do have administrative rights on my computer..

item.title: Scar 2.03
item.dc:creator: @hey321 hey321
item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

Scar 2.0.3 is out of date, use scar 3.12 with srl 4.0. 2.0.3 does NOT work with the new interface update.

Read full topic
